    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40d01599-2a80-4573-21f3-49023546cc47#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Albrecht Dürer: Férfiképmás</string>
            <string language="en">Albrecht Dürer: Male picture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrecht Dürer: Männliche Abbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrecht Dürer : Image mâle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrecht Dürer: Retrato masculino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrecht Dürer: Immagine maschio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αλψρεθχτ Dόrer: Αρσενική εικόνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrecht Dürer: Cuadro masculino</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Albrecht Dürer: Férfiképmás, 1504 k, Budapest, Szépművészeti Múzeum, 43 x 29 cm, olaj, fa.</string>
            <string language="en">Albrecht Dürer: Male picture, about 1504, Budapest, Museum of fine arts, 43 x 29 cm, oil, wood.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Szépművészeti Múzeum, Budapest,  Dürer, Albrecht,  késő gótikus művészet,  reneszánsz festészet,  Nürnberg,  Dürer,  portré,  16. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Museum Of Fine Arts, Budapest,  Dürer, Albrecht,  late gothic art,  renaissance painting,  Nürnberg,  Dürer,  portrait,  16th century,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albrecht Dürer: Männliche Abbildung, 
ungefähr 1504, Budapest, Museum der feinen künste, 43 x 29 
Zentimeter, Öl, Holz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albrecht Dürer : Image mâle, environ 1504,
Budapest, musée des arts fins, 43 x 29 centimètres, huile, bois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albrecht Dürer: Retrato masculino, 
aproximadamente 1504, Budapest, museu de artes finas, 43 x 29 cm, 
óleo, madeira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albrecht Dürer: Immagine maschio, circa 
1504, Budapest, museo delle arti fini, 43 x 29 centimetri, olio, 
legno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Αλψρεθχτ Dόrer: Αρσενική εικόνα, περίπου 
1504, Βουδαπέστη, μουσείο των καλών τεχνών, 43 X 29 
εκατ., πετρέλαιο, ξύλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albrecht Dürer: Cuadro masculino, cerca de 
1504, Budapest, museo de artes finos, 43 x 29 centímetros, aceite, 
madera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Museum der feinen künste, Budapest, Dürer, Albrecht, späte 
gotische kunst, Renaissanceanstrich, Nürnberg, Dürer, Portrait, 16. 
Jahrhundert,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musée des arts fins, Budapest, Dürer, Albrecht, art gothique 
en retard, peinture de la Renaissance, Nürnberg, Dürer, verticale, 
16ème siècle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Museu de artes finas, Budapest, Dürer, Albrecht, arte gothic 
atrasada, pintura do renascimento, Nürnberg, Dürer, retrato, 1õ 
século,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Museo delle arti fini, Budapest, Dürer, Albrecht, arte gotica 
ritardata, pittura di rinascita, Nürnberg, Dürer, ritratto, 
sedicesimo secolo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσείο των καλών τεχνών, Βουδαπέστη, Dόrer, 
Albrecht, πρόσφατη γοτθική τέχνη, ζωγραφική αναγέννησης, 
Nόrnberg, Dόrer, πορτρέτο, 16$ος αιώνας,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Museo de artes finos, Budapest, Dürer, Albrecht, último arte 
gótico, pintura del renacimiento, Nürnberg, Dürer, retrato, 
décimosexto siglo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
